Scripts.OnLoad:
TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(TMW.L["UIPANEL_RELATIVETO"], TMW.L["UIPANEL_RELATIVETO_DESC"]) self:SetSetting("relativeTo") TMW.SUG:EnableEditBox(self, "frameName", true)
self:CScriptAdd("ModifyValueForSave", function(self, value) value = value:trim()
if value == "" then value = "UIParent" self:SetText("UIParent") elseif value:match("|H") then value = value:match("|H(.-)|h.*|h") else -- Match by the return of GetGroupName(). This allows copy/paste of this value from one group to another. local trimmed = value:trim(" \t[]") for group in TMW:InGroups() do local groupName = group:GetGroupName():gsub("|c........", ""):gsub("|r", "") if groupName == trimmed then value = group:GetGUID() end end end
return value end)
self:CScriptAdd("ModifyValueForLoad", function(self, value) if TMW:ParseGUID(value) then local group = TMW.GUIDToOwner[value] local groupName = group and group.GetGroupName and group:GetGroupName() or value
-- Strip out the color reset after "Global" so the "link" stays pretty groupName = groupName:gsub("|r", "|cff7fffff")
return "|H" .. value .. "|h|cff7fffff[" .. groupName .. "]|r|h" end return value end)
-- Keep the group in the same place after changing this setting - modify the offsets accordingly. self:CScriptAddPre("SettingSaved", function() local group = TMW.CI.group
local GroupModule_GroupPosition = group:GetModuleOrModuleChild("GroupModule_GroupPosition") GroupModule_GroupPosition:UpdatePositionAfterMovement() end)
self.headerText:SetText(TMW.L["UIPANEL_RELATIVETO"])
-- TODO: make a cool sug module for this. -- TMW.SUG:EnableEditBox(self, "texture", true)

local stratas = { "BACKGROUND", "LOW", "MEDIUM", "HIGH", "DIALOG", "FULLSCREEN", "FULLSCREEN_DIALOG", "TOOLTIP", }
TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(TMW.L["UIPANEL_STRATA"], TMW.L["UIPANEL_STRATA_DESC"]) self:SetSetting("Strata")
self:SetMinMaxValues(1, #stratas) self:SetValueStep(1)
self:CScriptAdd("ModifyValueForSave", function(self, value) return stratas[value] end)
self:CScriptAdd("ModifyValueForLoad", function(self, value) return TMW.tContains(stratas, value) end)
self:CScriptAdd("SettingTableRequested", function(requester) return TMW.CI.gs end)
self:SetTextFormatter(TMW.C.Formatter:New(function(value) if value and stratas[value] then return TMW.L["STRATA_" .. stratas[value]] else return "" end end), TMW.C.Formatter.NONE)
